verbose_text: AMPK is activated by various upstream factors, such as liver kinase B1 (LKB1) or Ca (2+)/calmodulin-dependent protein kinase kinase (CaMKK), inhibited by mTOR, and leads to apoptosis by the activation of Tuberous sclerosis 2 (TSC2).
